content.content: NEWCOMER EDUCATION SUB-RING Typologies: Want to - Can Do Want to - Can’t Do Don’t want to *Focus on first two Outcomes: Sharing Experiences of successful conversations then mapping out potential personas Finding existing resources Creation of resources Curation of resources in a “salad bar” style pick & mix Feedback mechanism on the content Wrap content around blockchain concepts, but eliminate over complex semantics. Formats:  online library of definitions and examples online videos (?) DYI education kit (?)  Resources:  Personal experiences of successful conversations ConsenSys academy (potentially) analogies - gas: car petrol etc. licenses / unbranded (neutral)  Application:  examples per audience segment non jargon definitions of key concepts  Topics: Identity - ID Wallet - Money Exchange - Trade Action:  Comms channel to co-ordinate - Telegram Group (https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAEbNMzL7lGr0qyZssQ)) - Invite anyone you know was in our discussion group in the Council of Prague Repository seeded with notes, followed by resource sections etc. Repository with shared content: last modified, last used
